channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Hang on, there’s a Trump Phone Ultra coming too?
item.description: Where's the Trump Phone? We're going to keep talking about it every week. We've reached out, as usual, to ask about the Trump Phone's whereabouts. As usual, we're still waiting for a response. In the meantime, it turns out we might have two Trump Phones to worry about. The Trump Phone may be no more […]

item.title: Highguard, the PvP shooter from former Apex Legends and Titanfall creators, is still kicking and seemingly won't be delayed despite radio silence from devs
item.description: Wildlight Entertainment's PvP raid shooter Highguard appears to be alive and well, despite no updates since the game's announcement at The Game Awards last month.

item.title: The Best Use for Smart Glasses Might Have Nothing to Do With Entertainment
item.description: It's not all about getting email notifications plastered on your eyeballs.

item.title: Ingérence, faux sondage, manipulation : l’Arcom rappelle les règles du jeu à Snap, Instagram et X avant les élections municipales
item.description: Les plateformes en ligne comme TikTok, LinkedIn, X doivent aussi respecter certaines règles en période électorale, rappelées ce vendredi 23 janvier par le gendarme du Numérique et de l'Audiovisuel. Équipe de modération, points de contact, coopération... Voici ce qu'il faut en retenir.

item.title: Curl will stop bug bounties program due to avalanche of AI slop
item.description: A small team was being bombarded with submissions, many of which were low-quality, or AI-generated.

item.title: CBP Wants AI-Powered ‘Quantum Sensors’ for Finding Fentanyl in Cars
item.description: US Customs and Border Protection is paying General Dynamics to create prototype “quantum sensors,” to be used with an AI database to detect fentanyl and other narcotics.

item.title: Soldes d’hiver 2026 : la 3ème démarque continue avec de belles pépites juste avant le week-end
item.description: Cela fait déjà plus de deux semaines que les soldes d'hiver ont commencé en France et que les e-commerçants tels qu'Amazon, Fnac, Darty, Boulanger ou encore Cdiscount partagent des offres. C'est maintenant l'heure de la 3e démarque et voici les meilleures offres Tech à saisir.

item.title: Google Photos’ latest feature lets you meme yourself
item.description: The new feature lets you insert yourself into a meme in Google Photos.

item.title: Fnac et Darty font le plein d’offres pour le week-end des soldes
item.description: Le week-end approche, et les bonnes affaires continuent ! La 3ᵉ démarque des soldes d’hiver bat son plein chez Fnac et Darty, avec toujours plus d’offres Tech à ne pas manquer. Smartphones, tablettes, ordinateurs… les réductions se multiplient.

item.title: Own a PS5? These are the six free games I always have on my console
item.description: You can get plenty out of your console without spending a penny, as proven by these fantastic free PS5 games.

item.title: AMD's Ryzen 9850X3D is out next week – at a price that makes it a seriously tempting CPU for gamers
item.description: AMD reveals Ryzen 9850X3D costs $499, dispelling rumors that gaming champ CPU would be really expensive.

item.title: Meta pauses teen access to AI characters as it develops a specially tailored version
item.description: Meta will developed new versions of AI characters that will give age-appropriate responses

item.title: The 3 biggest lies robot vacuum brands are telling us, by a professional tester
item.description: Trying to see clearly through the marketing smoke and mirrors? Here are three big things to remember.

item.title: Ils ont percé le mystère de Jupiter : des grains cosmiques révèlent enfin sa vraie date de naissance
item.description: Homo sapiens constate et rapporte dans ses écrits des chutes de pierres venues du ciel depuis des millénaires, mais leur étude scientifique et la compréhension de leur origine ne datent que d'environ deux siècles, avec des avancées spectaculaires après la Seconde Guerre mondiale. Les météorites...

item.title: Xiaomi met les bouchées doubles ce week-end : les 15 meilleurs deals des soldes
item.description: Xiaomi a l’habitude de brader ses produits toute l’année, mais c’est encore plus flagrant ce week-end avec la 3e démarque des soldes d’hiver : des offres très attractives affluent sur une large sélection d’appareils, y compris les modèles les plus récents.

item.title: Marshall’s new hub connects to multiple Bluetooth speakers without pairing
item.description: Marshall has announced a new music streaming hub called the Heddon that can broadcast to multiple speakers using the Bluetooth Auracast feature that's finally starting to catch on. Similar to Sennheiser's BTA1 TV Transmitter announced earlier this week, the Heddon doesn't require wireless audio devices to go through a pairing process to stream audio, as […]...

item.title: JBL's new portable speakers have 'stem AI' for jamming — they can remove any instrument or vocal from songs in realtime, no internet required
item.description: JBL's BandBox Solo and Trio play songs in the key of AI

item.title: No, the Trump T1 phone still hasn't shipped, but it might finally arrive in March
item.description: Trump Mobile's T1 phone is now said to ship in March, if it isn't delayed again.

item.title: LG 55B5 : ce TV OLED abordable de 2025 chute sous les 800 € pour les soldes d’hiver
item.description: Si vous souhaitez changer de téléviseur, vous devriez trouver votre bonheur avec le LG OLED55B5. Ce TV offre une belle qualité d’image pour regarder confortablement ses contenus favoris avec un prix plus attractif lors des soldes : 799 euros au lieu de 1 199 euros.

item.title: Massive Winter Storm Could Knock Out Power Across the Nation. Here’s How to Prepare
item.description: The Eastern U.S. is bracing for widespread outages this weekend as heavy snow and ice pummel the region.

item.title: Today only, you can buy the AirPods Pro 3 for less than $200
item.description: If you’re considering gifting the AirPods Pro 3 for Valentine’s Day, now’s a great time to pick them up. Today only, Best Buy is selling the noise-canceling earbuds for $199.99 ($50 off), matching their all-time low. For iPhone owners, nothing else really compares to the AirPods Pro 3. They deliver the best active noise cancellation […]

item.title: Who is Devon Pritchard? Nintendo of America's new president makes first industry appearance since stepping into the role
item.description: Nintendo of America's new president, Devon Pritchard, has made her first official public appearance since taking over the role from Doug Bowser earlier this month.

item.title: Vimeo Lays Off ‘Most’ of Its Staff, Allegedly Includes ‘the Entire Video Team’
item.description: Employees reported major job cuts this week, just months after the video hosting site was bought by Bending Spoons.

item.title: Elle cartonne sur Spotify… mais c’est une IA
item.description: Ils sont des millions à être tombés sous le charme de la voix soul de Sienna Rose. La chanteuse classe plusieurs de ses titres dans les classements des plateformes de streaming. Seul problème : Sienna Rose n'existe sans doute pas, Deezer l'ayant catalogué comme une IA.

item.title: You can now create AI-generated coloring books in Microsoft Paint
item.description: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella recently went on record saying that AI still needs to prove its worth if society is to adopt it long-term, but he presumably thinks his company has cracked it with its latest innovation: AI coloring books. A new Microsoft Paint feature currently rolling out to Windows Insiders allows you to generate coloring book pages based on the text prompt you enter. The example Microsoft uses is "a cute fluffy cat on a donut," to which the AI tool will spit out a set of slightly different options based on your prompt. You can then choose which image you want, add it to your cur...

item.title: NBA League Pass is up to 55 percent off
item.description: Basketball fans can save on NBA League Pass right now, which lets you catch a bunch of out-of-market NBA games via streaming. The League Pass Premium subscription is on sale for $75, down from the usual $160, and League Pass Standard is marked down to $50 from $110. Considering we're almost halfway though the season, the discount makes sense and is a good deal for anyone who wants to keep a close eye on the rest of the games to be played this year. The Standard plan includes commercials and support for only one device at a time, while the Premium tier offers no commercials, in-arena streams du...

item.title: Huge data leak of 149 million credentials exposed without any protection – 98GB of unique usernames and passwords from financial services, social media accounts and dating apps
item.description: 98GB cloud storage container left exposed online and remained exposed for almost a month after discovery.

item.title: Carrefour : les 12 meilleures offres des soldes qui valent le coup ce week-end
item.description: Ce week-end, Carrefour lance une avalanche de bonnes affaires à l’occasion de la 3ᵉ démarque des soldes d’hiver ! Les offres se multiplient sur une large sélection de produits Tech : TV OLED à prix réduits, smartphones à petits prix et PC portables en promo… de quoi se faire plaisir sans se ruiner.

item.title: Here’s what you should know about the US TikTok deal
item.description: A number of investors are competing for the opportunity to purchase the app, and if a deal were to go through, the platform's U.S. business could have its valuation soar to upward of $60 billion.

item.title: Custom-made 'vishing' kits are attacking SSO accounts across the world - Google, Microsoft and Okta under threat, here's what we know
item.description: The kits are so good that vishing is growing more popular, but there is a solution.

item.title: Age Verification Is Reaching a Global Tipping Point. Is TikTok’s Strategy a Good Compromise?
item.description: TikTok’s new age-detection tech seems like a better solution than automatically banning youth accounts. But experts say it still requires social platforms to surveil users more closely.

item.title: Giving your healthcare info to a chatbot is, unsurprisingly, a terrible idea
item.description: Every week, more than 230 million people ask ChatGPT for health and wellness advice, according to OpenAI. The company says that many see the chatbot as an "ally" to help navigate the maze of insurance, file paperwork, and become better self-advocates. In exchange, it hopes you will trust its chatbot with details about your diagnoses, […]

item.title: AdGuard goes open-source with its custom VPN protocol that can mimic web traffic
item.description: AdGuard VPN's TrustTunnel is already being used across AdGuard VPN apps and is now available to "use, run, tweak, extend, and build upon," said the provider.

item.title: The Math on AI Agents Doesn’t Add Up
item.description: A research paper suggests AI agents are mathematically doomed to fail. The industry doesn’t agree.

item.title: Why this winter storm will likely be a wild one
item.description: Most of the US is bracing for a prolonged stretch of frigid weather and a massive winter storm that could wreak havoc on roads and power grids over the next several days. At least 170 million Americans are under winter weather alerts. "Bitterly cold temperatures and dangerously cold wind chills" will linger even after the […]

item.title: This startup will send 1,000 people’s ashes to space — affordably — in 2027
item.description: Started by an engineer who worked on the space shuttle program, and at Blue Origin, Space Beyond has a spot on a 2027 Falcon 9 flight.

item.title: The PlayStation Portal has been my favorite PS5 accessory since it launched — here are 8 ways Sony could make a new version even better
item.description: I’m a huge fan of the PlayStation Portal, but I think a newer version could make it even better. Here are the upgrades in a new model I’d love to see.

item.title: Trump turned the White House website into a personal action hero reel
item.description: Between feel-good shots of the president, the site includes clips of border patrol agents on horseback, military helicopters taking off, and ICE agents gearing up. The Trump administration just redesigned the official White House website. Its new aesthetic might best be described as a personal action hero reel for the president.

item.title: Thinking about revisiting The Witcher 3 ahead of The Witcher 4? This Witcher Online mode might keep you busy in the meantime
item.description: If you're thinking about diving back into The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt ahead of The Witcher 4, someone has released a multiplayer mod that may tide you over.

item.title: Get the Xreal One Pro AR Glasses for $170 less at Amazon
item.description: As of Jan. 23, the Xreal One Pro AR Glasses are on sale for $599, down from$769, at Amazon. That's a 22% discount or $170 in savings.

item.title: How to watch all of the 2026 Best Picture Oscar nominees
item.description: Here's how to watch every nominee for Best Picture at the 2026 Oscars: "One Battle After Another," "Sinners," "Hamnet," and more.

item.title: 50 ans après Apollo, pourquoi ce retour historique vers la Lune dépend de quelques jours clés
item.description: La fusée d’Artemis II est désormais sur son pas de tir en Floride et le compte à rebours technique a commencé. Mais contrairement aux apparences, la date de lancement ne dépend pas seulement de l’état du SLS : mécanique orbitale, sécurité des astronautes, énergie solaire et même météo imposent à...

item.title: Cette puissante barre de son JBL à moitié prix est l’affaire en or des soldes d’hiver
item.description: Compacte et puissante, la JBL SB560 est une barre de son idéale pour un téléviseur. Compatible Bluetooth, elle se transforme en enceinte traditionnelle pour diffuser de la musique depuis un smartphone. Durant les soldes d'hiver 2026, elle voit son prix chuter de 249 euros à seulement 129 euros grâce à un code promo.

item.title: Microsoft gave FBI a set of BitLocker encryption keys to unlock suspects’ laptops: Reports
item.description: The FBI served Microsoft a warrant requesting encryption recovery keys to decrypt the hard drives of people involved in an alleged fraud case in Guam.

item.title: TikTok-like microdramas are going to make billions this year, even though they kind of suck
item.description: The business model behind these apps replicates the same dark patterns as mobile games.

item.title: My employee calls in sick after negative feedback
item.description: He seems like he’s in a tailspin. A reader asks:

item.title: ‘Jujutsu Kaisen’ Peaked With Maki Zenin’s Rebirth
item.description: Mappa's adaptation of Maki Zenin's big moment deserves to be hung in the rafters of generational anime beatdowns.

item.title: Bezos’s Next Rocket Launch Might Be the Most Crucial Yet for Blue Origin
item.description: The company will reuse a New Glenn rocket booster for the first time.

item.title: TikTok finalizes deal to create new US entity and avoid ban
item.description: The deal ends a six-year long political saga that that started in 2020 when President Donald Trump tried to ban the app over national security concerns during his first term.

item.title: Tesla Optimus : le robot humanoïde chez vous dès 2027 ? Elon Musk y croit
item.description: Invité surprise à Davos, Elon Musk a lâché une information capitale pour l'avenir de Tesla. Le robot Optimus pourrait débarquer dans les foyers d'ici la fin 2027. Un pari risqué, mais vital pour la marque.

item.title: Snag a Magic: The Gathering March of the Machine booster box for below market value
item.description: As of Jan. 23, get the Magic: The Gathering March of the Machine booster box for below market value.

item.title: Get the Anker Solix C1000 Gen 2 portable power station for nearly half price
item.description: The Anker Solix C1000 Gen 2 is on sale at Amazon for only $429. That's 46% or $370 off its list price.

item.title: How to watch Skyscraper Live: See Alex Honnold climb one of the worlds tallest buildings in real time
item.description: Alex Honnold will climb Taipei 101 skyscraper live on Netflix in 'Skyscraper Live.' Here are the streaming details.

item.title: Iran Shows Why America’s Embrace of Stablecoins Is a Double-Edged Sword
item.description: Lawmakers are propping up the sanction-avoidance industry in the name of the almighty dollar.

item.title: OpenAI chief Sam Altman plans India visit as AI leaders converge in New Delhi: sources
item.description: Sam Altman is set for his first India visit in nearly a year.

item.title: Anbernic’s New Controller Has a Screen and Built-In Heartbeat Sensor, for Some Reason
item.description: The retro Game Boy maker's first pro-level controller may still be enticing even to non-hypochondriacs.
